name: Crazy Zoo
description:
"Crazy Zoo" is a small animal-themed match-3 game. The game is simple and easy to use, suitable for playing for a while in your spare time.
【Game Operation】
Click on a small animal with the left mouse button, and then drag it. After dragging, if there are 3 consecutive identical small animals, it will be eliminated.
【Game Features】
The game is easy to operate and has a relaxed atmosphere. It uses small animals as the theme and is suitable for children to play.
